Battles.Name: fight
Battles.Description: Challenge somebody to a waifu fight.

Trading.Name: addoffer
Trading.Description: Adds a waifu to the trade.

Trading.Name: removeoffer
Trading.Description: Removes a waifu to the trade.

Miscellaneous.Name: invite
Miscellaneous.Description: Displays an invite link for the bot.

Miscellaneous.Name: supportserver
Miscellaneous.Description: Displays an invite link to the WaifuBot support server

User.Name: buy
User.Description: Buys an item from the shop.

User.Name: dailyvote
User.Description: Gives you a link to the voting page for WaifuBot.

User.Name: equipbadge
User.Description: Equips or unequips a badge that you own.

User.Name: retire
User.Description: Retire a waifu from work and collect wages.

User.Name: setquote
User.Description: Sets your profile quote to a quote that you own.

User.Name: work
User.Description: Send one of your waifus to work for some cash.

User.Name: working
User.Description: Displays a list of all your working waifus.

General.Name: info
General.Description: Gives info about a waifu. Based on MyAnimeList ID or character name.

General.Name: lookup
General.Description: Finds entries in the waifu database and gets their IDs.

General.Name: remove
General.Description: Removes a waifu/husbando from your repository.

General.Name: seriesinfo
General.Description: Gives info about a series. Based on series ID or name.

Configurative.Name: setspawnchannel
Configurative.Description: Sets the server's spawn redirect channel.

Suggestions.Name: suggest
Suggestions.Description: Suggest something for the bot. Report a bug, or ask for feature. Whatever.

Suggestions.Name: suggestcharacter
Suggestions.Description: Suggest a character to be added to the database.
